content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-29.5, 30.5)
Consists of steam engine (position -29.5, 30.5), boiler (position -24.5, -50.0) and offshore pump (position -10.5, 25.5).

### Copper plate mine at position(-18.0, -49.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position -18.0, -49.0) with coal as fuel and producing copper plates.

### Copper cable factory
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position -18.0, -49.0) for smelting copper ore into copper plates.
- Assembling machine (position not specified) for crafting copper cables.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to inventory management
- Ensure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into entities. In this case, coal was needed for the furnace but was not available initially.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity on a tile before attempting to place it. 

### Errors related to power supply
- Ensure that all power-consuming entities (like the steam engine and lab) are connected to a power network to avoid issues with them being non-functional.
